name: media_playPrevious
description: This function is used to play the previous track or episode in a media application.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to play the previous track or episode.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to play the previous track or episode.

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: The name of the app to play the previous track or episode.

parameters.name: predefinedAppName
parameters.description: The predefined app name to play the previous track or episode.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the content to play the previous track or episode.

parameters.name: cast
parameters.description: The cast of the content to play the previous track or episode.
